医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
远程中风计划改善了农村患者的中风护理当患者可能患有中风时，几分钟很重要，但远离接受过神经病学高级培训的医生不再成为快速诊断和干预的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Telerinkle-program-improves-中风-care-for-rural-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Telerinkle-program-improves-中风-care-for-rural-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c80bddc9-3a95-4d43-aa89-17ccb6bedd10 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 15:34:08 -0400 Telestroke program improves stroke care for rural patients
研究探讨了慢性压力、轻度认知障碍和阿尔茨海默氏症之间可能存在的关联卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员在《阿尔茨海默病研究与治疗》杂志上发表了一项研究，探讨了慢性压力、轻度认知障碍和阿尔茨海默病之间可能存在的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Study-addresses-possible-associations- Between-chronic-stress-mild-cognitive-impairment-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Study-addresses-possible-associations- Between-chronic-stress-mild-cognitive-impairment-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86db1438-0c21-45eb-884b-59d83885ee08 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 15:29:03 -0400 Study addresses possible associations between chronic stress, mild cognitive impairment and Alzheimer's
新发现可以延缓三阴性乳腺癌的复发维也纳医科大学的一组研究人员发现，可以通过抑制一种称为 P-糖蛋白 (P-gp) 的特定蛋白质来靶向化疗后存活下来的休眠肿瘤细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/New-discovery-could-delay-relapse-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/New-discovery-could-delay-relapse-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5e44c05-2de8-467d-a1db-328cdb3a7e0f Tue, 03 Oct 2023 15:25:04 -0400 New discovery could delay relapse in triple-negative breast cancer
药剂师在提高 HPV 疫苗接种率方面可以发挥关键作用HPV（人乳头瘤病毒）是最常见的性传播感染。它也是宫颈癌的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Pharmacists-can-play-key-role-in-boosting-HPV-vaccination-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Pharmacists-can-play-key-role-in-boosting-HPV-vaccination-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba5abaf6-f8d1-4d4a-bb9d-db9975fedeb1 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 15:13:55 -0400 Pharmacists can play key role in boosting HPV vaccination rates
对一千个胚胎的基因测试提供了对人类发育和体外受精的见解通过对近千个胚胎进行基因测试，科学家们对人类体外受精后的胚胎命运进行了最详细的分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Genetic-testing-of-one-thousand-embryos-provides-insights-into- human-development-and-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Genetic-testing-of-one-thousand-embryos-provides-insights-into- human-development-and-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67eb2d35-35a9-4b14-8efa-17131911e874 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:52:06 -0400 Genetic testing of one thousand embryos provides insights into human development and IVF
引入精准医疗导航仪后，黑人前列腺癌患者的基因组检测率飙升临床导航员的存在充当前列腺癌患者和医疗保健系统之间的联络人，大大增加了患者（尤其是黑人患者）接受先进检测的可能性，这些检测可以帮助预测其疾病的严重程度并指导治疗。新的研究表明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Genomic-testing-rates-soar-for-Black-病人-with-prostate-cancer-after-introduction-of- precision-medicine-navigators.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Genomic-testing-rates-soar-for-Black-病人-with-prostate-cancer-after-introduction-of- precision-medicine-navigators.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=509571ff-60ed-416b-96f2-2200a5b416b5 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:30:35 -0400 Genomic testing rates soar for Black patients with prostate cancer after introduction of precision medicine navigators
研究证实液体活检可以准确检测宫颈癌患者的残留疾病一项新的研究证实，两项液体活检检测血液中是否存在人乳头瘤病毒（HPV），准确地识别出放化疗结束后宫颈癌复发风险较高的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Liquid-biopsies-can-accurately-detect-residual-disease-in-病人-with-cervical-cancer-study-confirms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Liquid-biopsies-can-accurately-detect-residual-disease-in-病人-with-cervical-cancer-study-confirms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c667bf9-3b69-4fb2-b4e8-213a3c75da01 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:23:32 -0400 Liquid biopsies can accurately detect residual disease in patients with cervical cancer, study confirms
立体定向放射治疗为患有无法手术的肾癌的老年人带来了新的希望澳大利亚和荷兰研究人员的一项新研究表明，被诊断患有不适合手术的肾脏肿瘤的老年人可能会受益于有针对性的高剂量放射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Stereotropic-radiation-therapy-offers-new-hope-for-older-adults-with-inoperable-kidney-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Stereotropic-radiation-therapy-offers-new-hope-for-older-adults-with-inoperable-kidney-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0485507d-dc66-4746-a3e3-c89ce5ee36b0 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:13:01 -0400 Stereotactic radiation therapy offers new hope for older adults with inoperable kidney cancer
研究发现粮食不安全与严重低血糖之间存在联系在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会上（10 月 2 日至 6 日）公布的新研究发现，在难以负担食物的成人糖尿病患者中，严重低血糖的发生率是其两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Study-finds-link- Between-food-insecurity-and-severe-hypoglycemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Study-finds-link- Between-food-insecurity-and-severe-hypoglycemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a02b9f19-862a-4aaa-a24b-6feea6afa21a Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:04:36 -0400 Study finds link between food insecurity and severe hypoglycemia
降低 HbA1c 阈值可能有助于 50 岁以下女性 2 型糖尿病的早期诊断和治疗将于今年在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（10 月 2 日至 6 日）上公布并发表在《糖尿病治疗》杂志上的新研究表明，2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 的诊断阈值）对于 50 岁以下的女性应降低，因为月经期间的自然失血可能会影响她们的血糖管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Lower-HbA1c-threshold-could-lead-to-earlier-diagnosis-treatment-of-type-2-diabetes-in-women-under-50。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Lower-HbA1c-threshold-could-lead-to-earlier-diagnosis-treatment-of-type-2-diabetes-in-women-under-50。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=537e2486-b49a-4d24-aaf7-b8d37ccd9fb4 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 13:58:11 -0400 Lower HbA1c threshold could lead to earlier diagnosis, treatment of type 2 diabetes in women under 50
